video_prompt: An anime-style female figure, defined by long blue hair and a flowing red gown, subtly turns. Her hair, dress train, and delicate adornments gracefully sway and glint. Her serene gaze gently shifts to a thoughtful expression. Ethereal red and white mist continuously swirls, revealing then obscuring faint architectural elements and vibrant red roses that emerge from the haze. Reflections on the dark, wet ground shimmer, distorted by the shifting mist, as soft light subtly pulses around her.
image_prompt:
Here's a concise prompt, prioritizing visual elements and common AI generation keywords:

"Full-body, highly detailed digital illustration of an anime-style young woman. She has very long, flowing aqua hair in two high ponytails, adorned with large red bows, prominent red jewels, and delicate gold dangling ornaments. Her delicate anime face features large, expressive light blue eyes and a serene expression. She wears a white beaded choker with a large teardrop red pendant.

She is dressed in an elaborate, off-the-shoulder, deep red mini-dress gown with a long flowing train. It has puffy short sleeves with white lace trim, a fitted bodice with a large central red bow (red jewel and silver chains), and an asymmetrical skirt (short front, revealing slender legs) with white lace trim and subtle golden rococo embroidery. The dress is heavily embellished with cascading silver chains, red roses, green leaves, silver beads, and pearl-like teardrop ornaments on her hips. She wears a red and silver beaded bracelet on her left wrist. Her legs are long and slender in shiny silver mid-calf high-heeled boots with ornate silver detailing and prominent red jewels.

The dramatic ethereal backdrop is dominated by swirling red and pink mist and clouds, with faint dark ornate architecture (upper left) and vivid red roses emerging from the mist (right). The ground is a dark reflective surface with scattered red roses. Soft diffused lighting creates a luxurious, fantastical, romantic, and slightly melancholic aesthetic."
refined_video_prompt: As a figure subtly turns, her long blue hair and flowing red gown gracefully sway. Delicate adornments glint. Her serene gaze gently shifts to a thoughtful expression. Ethereal red and white mist continuously swirls, revealing and obscuring faint architectural elements and vibrant red roses emerging from the haze. Reflections on the dark, wet ground shimmer, distorted by the shifting mist, as soft light subtly pulses around her.
